segments.text: Observing this kitchen, it's a typical daytime setup.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window lets in light, showing the garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Bushes and fence look well-kept outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the sink has water running steadily.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's filling up and overflowing onto the front.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, drying her plate carefully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy is on a stool by the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling out cookies from the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool seems a bit off-balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby has her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading across the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR
